examples.description: creates a new user and returns auth token
examples.full_description: Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/register with valid parameters creates a new user and returns auth token
Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/register with invalid parameters returns error for missing email
Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/register with invalid parameters returns error for duplicate email
Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/login with valid credentials returns auth token
Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/login with invalid credentials returns error for wrong password
Api::V1::Authentication POST /api/v1/auth/login with invalid credentials returns error for non-existent email
Api::V1::Authentication GET /api/v1/auth/me with valid token returns current user info
Api::V1::Authentication GET /api/v1/auth/me without token returns unauthorized
Api::V1::Authentication GET /api/v1/auth/me with invalid token returns unauthorized

exception.message: expected "Not enough or too many segments" to include "Invalid token"

examples.full_description: Api::V1::Authentication DELETE /api/v1/auth/logout returns success message

examples.description: returns all recipes with user info
examples.full_description: Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard as admin user returns all recipes with user info
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard as admin user includes complete recipe details
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard as author user returns only user own recipes
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard without authentication returns unauthorized
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard/stats as admin user returns system-wide statistics
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard/stats as author user returns user-specific statistics

exception.message: Validation failed: Name has already been taken

examples.full_description: Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard/my_recipes returns current user recipes
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard/all_recipes as admin user returns all recipes
Api::V1::Dashboard GET /api/v1/dashboard/all_recipes as author user returns unauthorized

exception.message: Render and/or redirect were called multiple times in this action. Please note that you may only call render OR redirect, and at most once per action. Also note that neither redirect nor render terminate execution of the action, so if you want to exit an action after redirecting, you need to do something like "redirect_to(...); return".

examples.full_description: Api::V1::Recipes GET /api/v1/recipes returns all recipes without authentication
Api::V1::Recipes GET /api/v1/recipes includes recipe details
Api::V1::Recipes GET /api/v1/recipes/:id returns specific recipe without authentication
Api::V1::Recipes GET /api/v1/recipes/:id returns 404 for non-existent recipe

examples.description: finds recipes by ingredients without authentication
examples.full_description: Api::V1::Recipes POST /api/v1/recipes/find_by_ingredients finds recipes by ingredients without authentication
Api::V1::Recipes POST /api/v1/recipes with authentication creates a new recipe
Api::V1::Recipes POST /api/v1/recipes without authentication returns unauthorized
Api::V1::Recipes PATCH /api/v1/recipes/:id as recipe owner updates the recipe

examples.description: allows admin to update any recipe
examples.full_description: Api::V1::Recipes PATCH /api/v1/recipes/:id as admin allows admin to update any recipe
Api::V1::Recipes PATCH /api/v1/recipes/:id as different user returns unauthorized
Api::V1::Recipes DELETE /api/v1/recipes/:id as recipe owner deletes the recipe

exception.message: expected `Recipe.count` to have changed by -1, but was changed by 0

examples.description: allows admin to delete any recipe
examples.full_description: Api::V1::Recipes DELETE /api/v1/recipes/:id as admin allows admin to delete any recipe

exception.message: expected `Recipe.count` to have changed by -1, but was changed by 0

examples.full_description: Api::V1::Recipes DELETE /api/v1/recipes/:id as different user returns unauthorized
